categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Modd was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.
Modd and Leven laid a minefield around the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Lulsla during the first phase of the assault by the Galactic Empire during the Aftermath of Hoth.
